MapItem.LocationDescription:
You are inside the city of Havenshire.
Tall buidlings are all around you,
including the Battle Arena where
warriors go to hone their skills
You find yourself in the grasslands to the east of Havenshire
The forest North of Havenshire is called Elkwood\nand here you are

Here you find a river, it looks like a pipe from the
Havenshire sewers leads here, who knows
 what has come out of there
West is the Elkwood
South is the Havenshire Grassland
